doc.field: Series XII: Financial Files, Grants, and Development
Series XII: Financial Files, Grants, and Development

According to the existing arrangement of material, general financial files and grant material are chronologically ordered. Development files, however, were received in alphabetical order. The original arrangement has been preserved.

Distinctions between Financial Files, Grants and Development were provided originally by the company and have been upheld. Much of the content, however, defies strict differentiation. For example, some grant-related material may be found in a box labelled "Financial Files" or some general development papers may be found in "Grants."
